about_the_game:
Look who's here children: it's Teddy Ayla! Yay!

Teddy Bear, Teddy Bear, turn around!

Teddy Bear, Teddy Bear, touch the ground!

Teddy Bear, Teddy bear, polish your shoes!

Teddy Bear, Teddy Bear, burn your enemies in a sea of fire!

Teddy Bear, Teddy Bear, turn off the light!

Teddy Bear, Teddy Bear, say goodnight!

This DLC contains a custom skin for Ayla in Awesomenauts. You need to have Ayla available as a playable character in order to access the skin in-game. Owning this skin will also unlock the special portrait for use in-game.
detailed_description:
Look who's here children: it's Teddy Ayla! Yay!

Teddy Bear, Teddy Bear, turn around!

Teddy Bear, Teddy Bear, touch the ground!

Teddy Bear, Teddy bear, polish your shoes!

Teddy Bear, Teddy Bear, burn your enemies in a sea of fire!

Teddy Bear, Teddy Bear, turn off the light!

Teddy Bear, Teddy Bear, say goodnight!

This DLC contains a custom skin for Ayla in Awesomenauts. You need to have Ayla available as a playable character in order to access the skin in-game. Owning this skin will also unlock the special portrait for use in-game.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Any processor with 2 Cores
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Video Card: AMD or NVIDIA videocard with at least 512MB, or Intel HD Graphics
  • Hard Disk Space: 3.5 GD HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Any processor with 2 Cores
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Video Card: AMD or NVIDIA videocard with at least 1024MB
  • Hard Disk Space: 3.5 GD HD space
  • Other: Broadband Internet connection

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX version 10.7 (Lion) or later
  • Processor: Any processor with 2 cores
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD or NVIDIA videocard with at least 512MB, or Intel HD Graphics
  • Hard Drive: 3.5 GD HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X version Lion 10.7 or later.
  • Processor: Any Processor with 2 Cores
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD or NVIDIA videocard with at least 1024MB
  • Hard Drive: 3.5 GD HD space
  • Other: Broadband Internet connection
